Definitions: rather; marks that the affected verb occured instead of another possibility (usually a different negated verb)
later; marks that the affected verb happens after something else
moreover; marks the affected verb as reinforcing or expanding on something expressed previously
earlier; marks that the affected verb occurs before something else

Adlam: いきえきぅかえあずあぜあ
ぅあぃぎがきぜぎいあぜあ
ぅあぃぎぜきずきぜかずあ
ぅぎぃきえかじかえきずき

Definitions: cause to swallow; cause to feel

Adlam: えあえぎぅきいかぜあ
えあぜあぉあえあずあぜあ
えあぜあぉかえきずき

Definitions: creates reflexive pronouns from personal or demonstrative pronouns

Adlam: えきえきぜかじあいあ
ぉあぜあぃあぜぎずき
ぉかくぎうかじかえきずき
ぉきえぎぜあいぎぜあ
げあぜあじぎじあいあ
げかじあすかぃあぜぎずき
げきえぎじかいきずき
こきうきこぎすかぜあ

Definitions: however; marks the affected verb in opposition to a prior predicate
needle; splinter; small thin sharp object
because; marks affected verb as purpose behind something else

こかえかいきこきずき

こきぜかすかこぎずき
じきがかえあぜぎこき

Definitions: thus; marks the affected verb as the result of another event
